mapper.select: SELECT F.FILE_UUID FROM FILES F WHERE F.FILE_STATE= 'pro' AND des_ID= #{id}
SELECT F.FILE_UUID, F.FILE_NAME FROM FILES F WHERE F.FILE_STATE= 'cer' AND des_ID= #{id}
SELECT FILE_UUID, FILE_NAME, COUR_NO FROM FILES WHERE FILE_STATE= 'thum' AND des_ID= #{id} ORDER BY COUR_NO
SELECT DC.COUR_NO, DC.TITLE, DC.DETAIL, DC.PRICE, DC.ID, f.file_uuid, f.cour_no FROM DES_COURSE DC join files f ON dc.COUR_NO = f.COUR_NO WHERE dc.cour_no = #{courNo} and f.file_state='thum'

SELECT DC.COUR_NO, DC.TITLE, DC.DETAIL, DC.PRICE, DC.ID, f.file_uuid, f.cour_no FROM DES_COURSE DC join files f ON dc.COUR_NO = f.COUR_NO WHERE dc.id = #{id} and f.file_state='thum' order by f.cour_no
select COUR_NO_SEQ.currval as cour_no from dual

SELECT a.day, to_char(day,'YY/MM/DD')||' '||time as lastst_date, a.time,a.state,a.price, a.reservate_date,a.cour_no,a.mem_attend,a.des_attend, a.con_no,a.mem_comment, a.mem_id, b.code,b.CODECONTENT, c.title,c.detail, d.name AS desName,d.career,d.major,d.id as des_id, e.name as memName,e.id as mem_id FROM CONSULTING_HISTORY a, COMMCODEDETAIL b , DES_COURSE c, DESIGNER d, member e WHERE a.state = b.code AND c.cour_no = a.cour_no AND d.id = c.id and a.mem_id = e.id AND d.id = #{desId}
mapper.update: update consulting_history set state =#{state} where con_no=#{conNo}
